title: Strong Correlation of PROMIS Upper Extremity and Shoulder Arthroplasty Smart Score to ...

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: PROMIS UE and SAS showed excellent correlation (>0.68) with ASES at 2 years post-surgery.
**TACTICAL WIN [SHIP NOW]**: Integrate automated reminders to maintain high completion rates for PRO assessments.
**MARKET SIGNAL [ðŸ”´ URGENT]**: Growing regulatory pressure to include PRO data in clinical trials and studies.
**CONCERN**: Self-selection bias may affect the generalizability of PROM outcomes.
